name: A White Room
description:
A weird game. It shouldn't be a visual novel.

Acknowledgement

- Made with Fungus

- Camera glitch shader from KinoGlitch, made by Keijiro

- Edge detection shader made by Harry Alisavakis

- Music: Blear Moon - Ongoing cases, from split by Cape Willoughby Road & Blear Moon

- SFX: Generated using Sfxia, made by RXI

- Font: Ubuntu font

- Font: a handwritten font made using Calligraphr

You could find the source code on GitHub.
